      • wrapMultiImage

        MapWrapper wrapMultiImage(BufferedImage image,
                          int rows,
                          int columns)
        Wrap an image and split it into multiple maps
        Parameters:
        image - the image to wrap
        rows - rows of the split (i.e. height)
        columns - columns of the split (i.e. width)
        Returns:
        the wrapper of the image

      • isIdUsedBy

        boolean isIdUsedBy(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player,
                   short id)
        Check if an map ID is used by a player
        Parameters:
        player - OfflinePlayer to check
        id - Map ID to check
        Returns:
        true if the ID is used

      • getNextFreeIdFor

        short getNextFreeIdFor(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
                throws MapLimitExceededException
        Get the next available (non-occupied) map ID for a player
        Parameters:
        player - Player to get the ID for
        Returns:
        the next available ID
        Throws:
        MapLimitExceededException - if there are no more IDs available (i.e. all IDs up to Short.MAX_VALUE are occupied by the player)

        Parameters:
        player - OfflinePlayer to clear the maps for
